phrs.translation: 一品粉, 玫瑰红, 罗茜, 小桃红
红景天, 冰原红景天, 红景天提取物, 红景天萃取物
玫瑰糠疹, 第二节玫瑰糠疹
智利风铃草, 智利风铃花, 百合科

sentences.sentence: Pityriasis rosea is an acute, benign, self-limiting skin rash.
sentences.translation: 玫瑰糠疹是一种急性的良性自限性皮疹。

sentences.sentence: When the test results came out, in the face of "pityriasis rosea" words, Ah Wei said he had complete despair.
sentences.translation: 当检查结果出来后，面对“玫瑰糠疹”几个字，阿伟说他已彻底绝望。

sentences.sentence: Application of Nosema locustae to control Chondracris rosea is an effective and promising biological control method.
sentences.translation: 应用蝗虫微孢子虫防治棉蝗，是一种有效而很有前途的生物防治方法。
